statements: SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM feedback_table WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM review_table WHERE review_date = '2021-10-25';
SELECT review_text FROM review_table WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT rating, comments FROM feedback_table WHERE rating <= 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM review_table WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback_table GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, comments FROM feedback_table WHERE comments IS NOT NULL ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table f JOIN review_table r ON f.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE f.rating > 4 ORDER BY f.feedback_id DESC, r.review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT feedback_id, review_text, review_date FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedbacks GROUP BY feedback_id;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT review_id, feedback_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM feedbacks WHERE rating < 3) ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM reviews GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks f JOIN reviews r ON f.feedback_id = r.feedback_id WHERE r.review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM GuestFeedback;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM GuestFeedback WHERE guest_id = 100;
SELECT guest_name, email_address, phone_number FROM GuestDetails WHERE guest_id = 200;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score FROM FeedbackAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT improvement_text, action_date FROM ServiceImprovement WHERE analysis_id = 300;
SELECT feedback_id, guest_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM GuestFeedback WHERE guest_id = 101;
SELECT guest_name, email_address, phone_number FROM GuestDetails WHERE guest_id IN (201, 202);
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT improvement_id, improvement_text, action_date FROM ServiceImprovement WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM GuestFeedback JOIN GuestDetails ON GuestFeedback.guest_id = GuestDetails.guest_id WHERE feedback_id = 501;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_id, product_id, rating FROM product_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT service_id, AVG(rating_score) AS avg_rating FROM service_ratings GROUP BY service_id;
SELECT guest_id, satisfaction_score FROM guest_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score < 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT product_id, review_text, rating FROM product_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT service_id, AVG(rating_score) AS avg_rating FROM service_ratings GROUP BY service_id;
SELECT guest_id, satisfaction_score FROM guest_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND guest_id IN (1, 2, 3);
